title: Fuck Fizz
body: Fuck Fizz and his q, fuck Fizz and his w, fuck Fizz and his E. Fuck his piss fucking keyboard fucking smashing over the head mechanics. Fizz if you read this I hate you, fuck you. Fuck you

replies.body:
Valentine's Day was 2 days ago... but I'm sure he's still up for some love.

#Yordlelove #Spreadthelove #Fishfishfish
Fizz isnt a yordle
And Teemo isn't the devil. Still doesn't mean we can't love yordles.

I hated fizz and then i tried counterpicks. He went from being"jaws" to "nemo".

Hammering him so hard with a champ i barely knew is why i know counters exist and why i always try to counter pick
Play Galio into him. Problem solved...
https://i.gyazo.com/0b387e21fea61158cf9ecee025696f0a.png
Why so much hate? If {{champion:105}} was to broken to handle they would have nerfed him before. Just saying {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

People just don't know how to counter him. I play alright against a Fizz. He doesn't have that many poke abilities, uses ALOT of mana, and sucks ass at pre-6. I know that first hand cause I main Fizz.
LOVE YOU FIZZ
Also he isn't fairly immobile if you get 40-45% cdr you have crazy uptime on E and Q
I WANT TO FCUK FIZZ!
And a bad day's fishing beats a good day's cs every time.

Update everyone: After months of observation I have come to the conclusion that Fizz is not all that bad, he is playable, well balanced and is fairly easy to lane against with most champs. I studied the fish like a good book, one page at a time. His abilities are relatively easy to read, he's fairly immobile (imo) and yeah he does damage but hey, which AP mid doesn't do damage hehe xD? I will accept him, as I believe the term 'Fish are Friends, not food' fits perfectly well into this debate/opinion/rant/"Fuck Fizz". I hope you all have a wonderful day, onwards and upwards. {{champion:105}}
fish
Play Ryze. Problem solved.
I main fizz xD he can burst a 4000+ hp full build Volibear{{champion:106}}  I agree he should be nerfed just the scaling though I think the base dmg is fine, just the scaling.
I just play zed, and wreck the crap outta him
